ygData.subject: Last names
ygData.msgSnippet: Ok I know I am way early on this one, but I am looking at last names for my troll. I am leaning towards soul-something.... Soulreaper, the Soulstealer, etc.
ygData.messageBody:
Ok I know I am way early on this one, but I am looking
at last names for my troll.
I am leaning towards soul-something.... Soulreaper, the
Soulstealer, etc. Or Bonecrusher. Cronik Bonecrusher
sounds good. Any other ideas? Heh. Plan on being 20th
in the next 2 weeks. :)

--
Cronik
Servant of Thule the Pain Bringer
9th Season Troll SK
Bertoxxulous

"Greenbloods jus be Froglok trick. Smash'm and they
blood same color a Froglok. Me smash'm Greenblood
for Thule. Thule make Cronik big feared. Make
smash'm fun."
